UPDATE alfred.users
SET preferences = 
  CASE 
    WHEN '{{ $json.value_type }}' = 'boolean' THEN
      jsonb_set(COALESCE(preferences, '{}'::jsonb), ARRAY['{{ $json.preference_key }}'], '{{ $json.preference_value }}'::jsonb)
    ELSE
      jsonb_set(COALESCE(preferences, '{}'::jsonb), ARRAY['{{ $json.preference_key }}'], to_jsonb('{{ $json.preference_value }}'::text))
  END,
updated_at = NOW()
WHERE slack_user_id = '{{ $json.slack_user_id }}'
RETURNING slack_user_id, preferences;
